Frequently Asked Questions ( FAQs)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#000000″ divider_style=”ridge” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.1″ custom_padding=”11px|||||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”WHAT IS A HACKATHON?” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}”]A hackathon is a social coding event where programmers, designers and developers collaborate to solve a problem and compete for cash prizes. It’s one part party, one part work-your-butt-off overnight battle against the clock and the competition.[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”WHY WOULD SOMEONE PARTICIPATE IN A HACKATHON?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}”]People participate in hackathons for lots of reasons: the challenge, the creative outlet, the community collaboration, the networking, the swag…[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”WHO IS THIS EVENT FOR?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

This event is open to both participants and spectators from the community who want to cheer them on and see what the hackathon is all about.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”WHO CAN PARTICIPATE? ARE THERE ANY PREREQUISITES OR REQUIRED SKILLS?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]Anyone is welcome to participate in this event. While experience coding and programming is a huge plus, teams will also need people with strong presentation skills and brilliant ideas.[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”DO I NEED A TEAM?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

While you do have the option of working alone, hackathon is a team event so working with others is encouraged. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”WILL THERE BE TRAINING?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

There is no pre-event training, but we’ll have Tresata team members on site who will be more than happy to answer your questions throughout the event. There will also be some additional information provided at the pre-event mixer, which we encourage everyone to attend.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”HOW ARE THE WINNERS SELECTED ?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]There will be an independent jury selecting the winners with a rating system: (Implementability, Financial benefits, presentation skill, Creativity).[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”How many members are there can be in a team?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#004fe8″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ title_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” title_font_size=”11px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” title_line_height=”1.6em” body_font=”Muli||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|true|true” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.12)” border_width_bottom=”1px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

There can be maximum five members in the team including team leader.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”||0px|||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”2560px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
